history.content:
HKN is planning short, casual coffee chats for high school students this fall! We’re hoping to provide advice and insight into life at Berkeley, share experiences about being a STEM student, and generally give students an opportunity to meet someone friendly at Berkeley, especially since they might not be able to visit during their college applications process to gain a better feel for themselves.

Volunteers would be matched with any interested high school student for a live chat on Zoom (to be scheduled at their convenience), or put into contact with high school students who might ask questions about being a student at Berkeley, different opportunities available, choosing majors or specializations, or college application-related questions. Bear Chats is intended to be a very low time commitment for a wide range of volunteers, and many of the chats will be one-time and be under an hour. We would love to have you bring your unique experiences and background to the team! Here’s a sign up form for anyone who’s interested: hkn.mu/bearchatsvolunteer
history.subject: Volunteer with Berkeley Bear Chats!
